think_procedure.2: Check the documentation or source code of PostgreSQL to understand the behavior of this knob.
think_procedure.3: Determine if the knob has special values that change its behavior significantly.
think_procedure.4: If a special value exists, verify if setting the knob to this value disables or alters a feature in a way that is not a simple numerical progression.
think_procedure.5: Classify the knob as 'special' if it meets the criteria, otherwise classify it as a regular numerical knob.
